original_text: And immediately the flow of blood dried up, and she felt in her body that she was healed of her disease.
korean_text: 이에 그의 혈루 근원이 곧 마르매 병이 나은 줄을 몸에 깨달으니라

sentences.original_text: And immediately the flow of blood dried up
and she felt in her body
that she was healed of her disease.
